originalText.text: No staff member at portofino has been anything but polite I'd even say nice,it's a little pricey but it's on the upper west side ,they do regularly offer special rates frequently ,I had bought a package right before the pandemic and hadn't been able to go there for several months ,but when I returned they honered the package I bought and i received all the sessions I paid for ,they do a good job of keeping track of the sessions you pay for in advance I've never experienced them shaving a session off as time goes by ,i cant say a bad word about portofino although i dont like the lobby of the building they moved to on 72nd st  and columbus

originalText.text:
Victoria is kind, however because of Covid both my sister and I lost 2 sessions each (after both purchasing 3 packs). We came back to use them when everything opened back up, only to be charged for two more (3 pack) sessions each. She said she would look into restoring those lost sessions, however when I came to use them again, all 8 sessions (4 each) left were no longer in the computer. She said she would "do me a favor" and give me a session for "free." It was not free, I paid for it, and I still had sessions left. I would go to a place that has updated computer systems, doesn't lose all of your purchased sessions and doesn't make you feel crazy for keeping records of your purchases.

Long story short, 12 sessions purchased and only 4 used. Go somewhere else or only pay for one session at a time, so you don't end up pale and broke like me!

originalText.text: Out of any tanning spot in the city this place has the cleanest, newest facility with easily the friendliest and most accommodating staff possible.  They take COVID precautions very seriously and their call-in appointment system is super quick and easy.  In addition, the price for packages and sessions doesn't break the bank like a lot of spots, and they offer very good deals!  They'll have my business as long as I'm in NYC!

originalText.text:
It was the most terrible experience in my life! The staff is unbelievable rude. The machines didn’t work and I had to get of the room and claim that issue and they literally kicked me out. Even through the prices are so high their machines is super cheap and very unprofessional staff. Never ever go to them!

When I purchased 10 points which is 6 sessions and I used only 4 sessions the rest they didn’t let me to use by laying.

They also discriminate people by color and nationality!

Terrible service and very unprofessional’

originalText.text: Kadi for personalized spray tan is incredible, highly recommended. She is very experienced, she can customize to your skin tone and/or how light or dark you would like to be! The color lasts a long time and was reasonably priced. Great for anytime  of year!
